div.pre: 362 Mt. Athos environs ("canal of Xer- (104) xes"), Macedonia, c. 1839 Burial: after 400 B.C. (Starr) Contents: 300 AV, c. 100 AR Athens: c. 100 tetradr. (1 illus. by Beulé is an eastern imit. and another at Paris, seen by Kraay, is 4th cent.) Persia: 300 darics Disposition: Borrell 125 darics (Sotheby July 12, 1852, 426-31); Paris 10 (9 darics ex Borrell; 1 Athens); Lon- don 1? (ex Borrell) Borrell, NC 1843-4, p. 153, note Beulé, Les Monnaies d' Athènes (Paris, 1858), pp. 43-4, (illus. 1 Athens) Babelon, Catalogue des monnaies grecques de la Bibliothèque Nationale. Les Perses (Paris, 1893), p. xiv, illus. (3 darics); JIAN 1905, pp. 42-3 Howorth, NC 1903, p. 29 Starr, Athenian Coinage, p. 87
